Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavin Manushar Perththezhudhina Saalomonudaiya Needhimozhigal:
2 kaariyaththai Maraippadhu Dhevanukku Menmai; Kaariyaththai Aaraaivadho Raajaakkalukku Menmai.
3 vaanaththin Uyaramum, Boomiyin Aazhamum, Raajaakkalin Irudhayangalum Aaraaindhumudiyaadhu.
4 velliyinindru Kalimbai Neekkividu, Appozhudhu Thattaanaal Nalla Udaimai Pirakkum.
5 raajaavin Munnindru Dhushtarai Neekkividu, Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Singaasanam Needhiyinaal Nilainirkum.
6 raajaavin Samugaththil Menmaipaaraattaadhe; Periyorgaludaiya Sthaanaththil Nillaadhe.
7 un Kangal Kanda Prabuvin Samugaththil Nee Thaazhththappaduvadhu Nalladhalla; Avan Unnaip Paarththu: Mele Vaa Endru Solvadhe Unakku Menmai.
8 vazhakkaadap Padhatramaaip Pogaadhe; Mudivile Un Ayalaan Unnai Vetkappaduththumbodhu, Nee Enna Seyyalaam Endru Thigaippaaye.
9 nee Un Ayalaanudane Maaththiram Un Vyaajyaththaikkuriththu Vazhakkaadu, Matravanidaththil Ragasiyaththai Velippaduththaadhe.
10 matrappadi Adhaik Ketkiravan Unnai Nindhippaan; Un Avamaanam Unnaivittu Neengaadhu.
11 etra Samayaththil Sonna Vaarththai Velliththattil Vaikkappatta Porpazhangalukku Samaanam.
12 ketkira Sevikku, Gnaanamaaik Kadindhukondu Buththisollugiravan, Porkadukkanukkum Aparanjip Pooshanaththirkum Sari.
13 kodaikaalaththil Uraindhamazhaiyin Kulirchchi Eppadiyirukkiradho, Appadiye Unmaiyaana Sthaanaabadhiyum Thannai Anuppinavanukku Iruppaan; Avan Than Ejamaangaludaiya Aaththumaavaik Kulirappannuvaan.
14 koduppen Endru Solliyum Kodaamalirukkira Vanjagan Mazhaiyillaadha Megangalukkum Kaatrukkum Sari.
15 neenda Porumaiyinaal Prabuvaiyum Sammadhikkappannalaam; Iniya Naavu Elumbaiyum Norukkum.
16 thenaik Kandupidiththaayaanaal Mattaai Saappidu; Midhaminji Saappittaal Vaandhipannuvaai.
17 un Ayalaan Saliththu Unnai Verukkaadhapadikku, Adikkadi Avan Veettil Kaal Vaikkaadhe.
18 piranukku Virodhamaaip Poisaatchi Sollugira Manushan Thandaayudhaththukkum Katkaththukkum Koormaiyaana Ambukkum Oppaanavan.
19 aabaththukkaalaththil Dhrogiyai Nambuvadhu Udaindha Pallukkum Mozhipuranda Kaalukkum Samaanam.
20 manadhukkamullavanukkup Paattugalaip Paadugiravan, Kulirkaalaththil Vasthiraththaik Kalaigiravanaippolavum, Vediyuppinmel Vaarththa Kaadiyaippolavum Iruppaan.
21 un Saththuru Pasiyaayirundhaal, Avanukkup Pusikka Aagaarangodu; Avan Thaagamaayirundhaal, Kudikkath Thanneerkodu.
22 adhinaal Nee Avan Thalaiyinmel Erigira Thazhalgalaik Kuvippaai; Karththar Unakkup Balanalippaar.
23 vadakaatru Mazhaiyaiyum, Purangoorugira Naavu Kobamugaththaiyum Pirappikkum.
24 sandaikkaariyode Oru Periya Veettil Kudiyiruppadhaippaarkkilum, Veettinmel Oru Moolaiyil Thanguvadhe Nalam.
25 dhooradhesaththilirundhu Varum Narseydhi Vidaaiththa Aaththumaavukkuk Kidaikkum Kulirndha Thanneerukku Samaanam.
26 dhunmaarkkarukku Munbaaga Needhimaan Thallaaduvadhu Kalangina Kinatrukkum Kettuppona Sunaikkum Oppaagum.
27 thenai Migudhiyaai Unbadhu Nalladhalla, Tharpugazhai Naaduvadhum Pugazhalla.
28 than Aaviyai Adakkaadha Manushan Madhilidindha Paazhaana Pattanampolirukkiraan.
